assembling_gift_baskets: Put one candle, one cheese, one cookie, and one bow into each basket.
bottling_fruit: Slice the strawberry and the peach, put the sliced strawberry and peach in separate jars, and close the jars.
boxing_books_up_for_storage: Place the books into the carton for storage.
bringing_in_wood: Bring all plywood pieces inside and put them down.
brushing_lint_off_clothing: Check every sweater for lint, make sure none of them are dusty, and put them on the bed.
chopping_vegetables: Slice all the vegetables, and put all sliced vegetable into dishes.
cleaning_a_car: Use the soap, rag and bucket to clean dust off the car.
cleaning_barbecue_grill: Clean stains and dust off of the barbecue grill.
cleaning_bathrooms: Use the rag and bucket to clean stains off the toilet, the bathtub, the sink, and the floor.
cleaning_bedroom: Put clothes inside the cabinets, put jewelry and perfume inside the cabinet, place the sheet on the bed and the painting on top, clean the cabinets of any dust, place the vacuum next to the bed.
cleaning_closet: Organize all jewelry inside cabinet3, make sure umbrella1 is not inside cabinet3, place hat1 inside the cabinet or on top of shelf1, place all sandals next to shelf1 and on the floor, clean dust from cabinet3, shelf1, and floor1.
cleaning_cupboards: Clean dusty cabinets, remove all books from the cabinets, put the screwdriver in the bin, put all markers and pens in the bucket.
cleaning_floors: Clean dust and stains off the floors.
cleaning_freezer: Clean the stained freezer and remove all food items from the freezer.
cleaning_garage: Clean dust and stains off the floor and cabinet, put all newspapers into the bin or on the floor, and put all bottles on the table.
cleaning_kitchen_cupboard: Clean all dusty cabinets, put all bowls in one cabinet and all cups in another.
cleaning_out_drawers: Remove the piece of cloth, two bowls, and two spoons from the drawers and put them near the sink.
cleaning_oven: Clean the oven using wet rags and scrub brushes.
cleaning_shoes: Clean all the shoes, and leave the towel on the floor.
cleaning_sneakers: Place the towel on the countertop, the brush next to the towel, and the soap into the sink. Clean the dusty and stained sneakers, place 2 sneakers next to the table and 2 other sneakers under the table.
cleaning_stove: Use the rag and dishtowel to clean the dusty and stained stove, then leave them next to the sink.
cleaning_table_after_clearing: Clean the table after clearing it.
cleaning_the_hot_tub: Clean the stained hot tub located on floor1.
cleaning_the_pool: Clean the stained pool on the floor using the scrub brush and the detergent, when you are done leave the brush on top of the shelf, and the detergent on the floor.
cleaning_toilet: Use the scrub brush and detergent to clean the stained toilet, and leave them on the floor when finished.
cleaning_up_after_a_meal: Clean all the stained tableware, put all hamburgers into sack1 which is on the floor, and clean the stained floor, chair, and table.
cleaning_up_refrigerator: Use the rag and soap to clean the trays, the bowl, and the refrigerator. When you are done, leave the rag and bowl next to the sink, the soap in the sink, and the trays in the refrigerator.
cleaning_up_the_kitchen_only: Use the soap and rags to clean the plates, cabinets and floor, then leave the soap and rags near the sink. Place the blender on the countertop, store vegetable oil in one cabinet and plates in another cabinet, and put the fuits and vegetables in the fridge.
cleaning_windows: Soak the rags and use them to clean the dusty windows.
clearing_the_table_after_dinner: Put all cups, bowls, and catsup into buckets.
collect_misplaced_items: Collect all misplaced items including the gym shoe, necklace, notebook, and socks. Then place them on the table.
collecting_aluminum_cans: Collect all aluminum cans and place them into the bucket.
defrosting_freezer: Place the receptacle next to the refrigerator, the bucket next to the countertop, the scraper on top of the refrigerator, the towel on the countertop, the soaked rag inside the sink, and all the food inside the bucket.
filling_a_Christmas_stocking: Fill each stocking with one cube, one candy, and one pen.
filling_an_Easter_basket: Place eggs, candies, jewelry, balls, bows, and books in the baskets on the countertop.
installing_a_fax_machine: Place the fax machine on the table and turn it on.
installing_a_modem: Place the modem under the table and make sure it is turned on.
installing_a_printer: Place the printer on the table and turn it on.
installing_a_scanner: Turn on the scanner and place it under the table.
installing_alarms: Place each alarm on a table and make sure they are turned on.
laying_tile_floors: Lay all the tiles on the floor.
laying_wood_floors: Lay the plywoods on floor2 right next to each other.
loading_the_dishwasher: Load all plates, bowls, and the mug into the dishwasher.
locking_every_door: Close and lock all the doors.
locking_every_window: Close and lock all the windows.
making_tea: Slice the lemon, heat the tea on the stove.
mopping_floors: Use the bucket, soap and broom to clean the stained floor, when you are done, leave the soap in the bucket and place the bucket and broom next to the sink.
moving_boxes_to_storage: Move carton1 to floor2 and place carton2 on top of carton1.
organizing_boxes_in_garage: Put all balls and plates inside separate cartons, put the saucepan inside one of the cartons, and place all cartons on the floor.
organizing_file_cabinet: Place all documents and folders inside the cabinet, and put the marker on the table.
organizing_school_stuff: Place the folder, highlighter, pencil, pen, and calculator into the backpack, then leave the backpack on the bed.
packing_adult_s_bags: Pack all jewelry, makeup, toothbrush, and mouse inside the backpack, and place the backpack on the second floor.
packing_bags_or_suitcase: Pack the backpack with underwear, toothbrush, shampoo, hardback, and toothpaste. Place the backpack on the bed or on the floor.
packing_boxes_for_household_move_or_trip: Pack all plates, the dishtowel, books, shirts, and the sweater inside separate cartons.
packing_car_for_trip: Pack the briefcase, pencil box, headset, and duffel bag inside the car for the trip.
packing_child_s_bag: Place the sunglasses, notebook, bracelet, apple, and earphones inside the backpack next to the bed.
packing_food_for_work: Pack a sandwich, an apple, a snack food, and a juice into a carton, and place the carton on the floor or on the countertop.
packing_lunches: Place chips, cookies, salad, juice, sandwich, and pop in separate cartons, ensuring the correct items are inside each carton. Additionally, put either an apple or a banana in each of carton1 and carton2.
packing_picnics: Pack all chips and sandwiches inside one carton. Pack all fruits inside one carton. Pack all drinks inside one carton.
picking_up_take-out_food: Place the sushi and hamburger inside separate cartons that are on the table.
picking_up_trash: Pick up all pads and pops and put them inside the ashcan.
polishing_furniture: Polish the table and the shelf, and place the rag under the table.
polishing_shoes: Soak the rag, polish both shoes, and place the rag next to the sink.
polishing_silver: Polish all spoons and put them inside the cabinet.
preparing_a_shower_for_child: Place the towel, shampoo, and soap on the floor near the sink for the child's shower.
preparing_salad: Place a whole lettuce, a sliced apple, a sliced tomato, and a whole radish on separate plates.
preserving_food: Slice and cook all the strawberries, then seal them inside the jar, remember to freeze the beef.
putting_away_Christmas_decorations: Place all wreaths and bows next to the cabinet, and put all ribbons inside the cabinet.
putting_away_Halloween_decorations: Place all pumpkins and candles into the cabinet, arrange the sheet either next to or on the table, and position the caldron next to the table.
putting_away_toys: Put all the toys into cartons.
putting_dishes_away_after_cleaning: Put all plates inside the cabinet after cleaning.
putting_leftovers_away: Put all pasta and sauce inside the fridge.
putting_up_Christmas_decorations_inside: Place all wrappings under or next to the Christmas tree, place all candles on the table, place one bow on the table, two bows on the sofa, and place the wreath on the table.
re-shelving_library_books: Place books 1 through 4 on the shelf, and place books 5 through 8 on the table.
rearranging_furniture: Place lamp1 next to the door, lamp2 next to the window, have seat1 touching the bed, and place seat2 next to the window.
serving_a_meal: Serve the meal by placing all food and drinks on the table along with the appropriate utensils.
serving_hors_d_oeuvres: Place the tray on the table, put the crackers on the table, place the salads next to the crackers, and put the parsley on top of the cheese.
setting_mousetraps: Place mousetraps 1 and 2 on the floor, and mousetraps 3 and 4 next to the toilet.
sorting_books: Place all types of books on the shelf.
sorting_groceries: Sort the groceries into the fridge and the cabinet based on your common sense. Place groceries of the same type next to each other.
sorting_mail: Sort the envelopes and newspapers into two stacked piles.
storing_the_groceries: Store the groceries into the fridge and the cabinet based on your common sense. Place groceries of the same type next to each other.
thawing_frozen_food: Place the frozen food items next to the sink to thaw.
throwing_away_leftovers: Throw away all leftover hamburgers into the trash.
unpacking_suitcase: Place the carton on the floor, then take everything from the carton and place them on the sofa.
washing_cars_or_other_vehicles: Wash all dust and stains from the car or vehicle.
washing_dishes: Wash all the stained plates, cups, and bowls.
washing_floor: Clean the dust and stain off the floor.
washing_pots_and_pans: Clean all the stained pans, kettles, and teapots and place them inside a cabinet.
waxing_cars_or_other_vehicles: Wax the dust off the vehicle.
